title: Quarkus 3.19.x - issue with quarkusIntTest executable - reading application.property fails
body:
### Describe the bug

Hello everybody.

I have a problem with 3.19.3 quarkus version when running **quarkusIntTest**.

For some reason my tests in package **src/integrationTest/kotlin/endtoend** annotated with **@QuarkusIntegrationTest** cannot properly read property from **src/main/resources/application.properties** or somehow they are not being run in test profile - don't know atm.

Here is how application.properties looks like:
`my.property=${MY_PROPERTY}`
`%dev,test.my.property=testingQuarkus`

**Important**: there was 0 issues with running these tests natively with Quarkus 3.17.8

Has there anything changed with 3.19.3 or 3.19.4 version that I have to take into account?

If there is any info you'd like me to provide more, please let me know.

Here is link to [ZulipChat](https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/187030-users/topic/Quarkus.203.2E19.2E3.20-.20quarkusIntTest.20issue.20with.20properties/near/506717986) where I initially touched upon the topic.

Thank You for support.

### Expected behavior

GreetingResourceTestEndToEnd from package **src/integrationTest/kotlin/endtoend** and annotated with **io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusIntegrationTest** passes successfully as it does with quarkus 3.17.8

### Actual behavior

2 issues I see from tests report:

1) Failed to load config value of type class java.lang.String for: my.property

2) Waited 60 seconds for build/quarkus.log to contain info about the listening port and protocol but no such info was found. Check if the options quarkus.log.level and quarkus.log.file.level are at least INFO (or more verbose).
Failed to launch the application. The application logs can be found at: /Users/XYZ/Desktop/code-with-quarkus/build/quarkus.log


### How to Reproduce?

Link to reproducer - [GitHub](https://github.com/DudekJakub/quarkus-3-19-3-native-testing-issue)

There are 3 branches:

- **master** with quarkus 3.19.3 -> it is crucial for me and my team as we're going with it on PRD soon
- **quarkus-3-19-4-error** -> has the same issue as 3.19.3
- **quarkus-3-17-8-ok** -> here everything works correctly

Here is how I run these tests with GRAALVM (Java 21.0.1-graalce):
`./gradlew quarkusIntTest \
        --stacktrace \
        -Dquarkus.test.native-image-profile=test \
        -Dquarkus.test.profile=test \
        -Dquarkus.test.integration-test-profile=test \
        -Dquarkus.profile=test \
        -Dquarkus.package.jar.enabled=false \
        -Dquarkus.native.enabled=true`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Mandrel or GraalVM version (if different from Java)

Java 21.0.1-graalce

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.19.3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 8.12

### Additional information

_No response_
